item.title: Luarocks MITM
item.description: Background LuaRocks is a package manager for Lua. The executable “luarocks” allows users to download Lua packages and dependencies from luarocks.org (the default) upload packages to luarocks.org Several months ago I found a man-in-the-middle vulnerability and reported it to the LuaRocks project via Gitter. I was directed to create a public issue on github. At the time of writing, there’s no CVE assigned by the project or github security notification.
